name: Diamond Animals Gorilla
description:
Diamond Animals Gorilla - 3rd of 10 art from the "Diamond Animals" collection.

The DNA of this animal is more than 95% similar to that of humans. Gorillas are second only to two species of chimpanzees in relation to us. All other monkeys are less related to humans. By the way, when walking on hands and feet, gorillas do not rest on their palms, but on clenched fists. Of all the monkeys, only they and chimpanzees do this.

----///----

1920 x 1920 px / 25 fps / Loop
